name: 杖をついて寒さをしのぐサル
name_original: 杖をついて寒さをしのぐサル
description:
Disclaimer

A game developed in 36 hours for LaGameja.

杖をついて寒さをしのぐサル is a puzzle platformer game where you are a small monkey escaping from a tornado.

Story

Atlas the Monkey needs your help. He's trying to escape from a massive tornado coming right after him. Help Atlas save his life and enjoy beautiful Japanese landscapes.

Developers:

Lidia Álvarez - Artist

Guillem - Programmer

Veronika Bolshakova - Programmer

Jose Canovas - Artist

Alex Terradas- Programmer
